Short Description: A modern, state-of-the-art machine shop providing production and prototyping services for commercial, industrial, and government sectors. They operate a 30,000 sq. ft. facility with a wide range of milling and turning resources for both small and large projects, plus a staffed inspection room focused on quality.

Kin-Tech Manufacturing is a precision machine shop in Western Pennsylvania that specializes in supporting the Naval Nuclear Propulsion Program and related industries. Their core expertise is precision machining, with a focus on producing end-use components and test specimens (often made to strict standards for materials testing). They’ve operated since 1989 and emphasize innovation, precision, and quality.

Pioneer Machine & Tool Co. operates a full-service manufacturing facility (about 20,000 sq. ft.) delivering work from fabrication through final assembly. They produce single-piece components and complex assemblies to tight tolerances, with capabilities including machining, sheet metal fabrication, welding, finishing, and assembly. Their quality system is ISO 9001:2015 and AS9100D certified, supporting aerospace/defense-grade requirements.

AccroTool is a full-service contract manufacturer of engineered metal products serving markets like defense, industrial, instrumentation, medical/safety equipment, and transportation. They offer end-to-end capabilities including CNC machining, custom metal fabrication, laser processing, metal stamping, finishing/painting, specialized welding, and full assembly. They emphasize controlling the supply chain from raw material to finished parts, and note an ISO 9001:2015 quality system.
address: 401 Hunt Valley Rd, New Kensington, PA 15068

Short Description: Hamill Manufacturing is a precision machining, fabrication, and welding company that delivers “complete solutions” by combining machining with assembly, engineering, inspection/testing, documentation, and packaging. They provide precision CNC milling/turning, EDM (wire + sinker/RAM), and highly qualified welding (AWS/ASME/Navy standards with in-house NDT). They serve industries that demand rigorous quality, including defense, nuclear, aerospace, and energy.

Aggressive Grinding Service (AGS) is a Latrobe, PA provider specializing in precision tungsten carbide grinding and advanced ceramic finishing, positioned as a leading source for these services. They operate from a 42,000 sq. ft. facility and offer a broad mix of services including surface/centerless/OD/ID grinding, honing, wire EDM, and machining/value-added work for complex or high-volume jobs. 
They emphasize fast turnaround alongside tight-tolerance quality.

AMC Machine, Inc. is a Ruffs Dale, PA machine shop described in business directories as specializing in metal-cutting machine tools / machining services. It’s listed as founded in 1988 and operates as a local manufacturing/machining business serving customers from its Westmoreland County location. CNC machining shop positioning as a “one stop” partner (finishes, marking/screen printing via partners) with CNC mills/lathes plus waterjet; serves nuclear/military and other customers.
address: 229 Potoka Mine Rd, Ruffs Dale, PA 15679

Short Description: Avanti Engineering is a family-owned precision machine shop manufacturing screw-machine products and CNC-machined parts since 1972, with an ISO 9001:2015 quality system. Their capabilities include multi-spindle high-speed screw machines, multi-axis CNC + Swiss CNC machining, and an in-house toolroom (wire EDM), plus CAD/CAM and secondary operations/light assembly. They emphasize high-volume, tight-tolerance components built to customer specs with responsive service and inventory/just-in-time support.

Stellar Precision Components is a Jeannette, PA manufacturing company specializing in serving the aerospace (and defense) industries.  They offer precision CNC machining, including turning and milling, and list extensive shop capabilities such as CNC lathes/mills plus EDM and metrology/inspection equipment. They emphasize handling projects of varying size/complexity with modern equipment and quality-focused processes.
Tool & die focus—Weiss-Aug describes progressive stamping tool & die design/manufacture; JK Tool is referenced as a Weiss-Aug division with progressive die capability growth.

Scientific Tool, Inc. is a specialized tool and die job shop and machining facility located in Westmoreland County, PA. focuses on providing innovative tools and high-precision solutions for ool and Die Manufacturing, Precision Machining, Industrial Solutions

PIAD Precision Casting Corporation is a major permanent mold foundry specializing in non-ferrous chill mold casting and precision machining. Established in 1967, it operates two primary facilities within Westmoreland County, PA. PIAD is known for its proprietary chill mold process, which produces high-density, near-net-shape functional components that often eliminate the need for secondary machining.
Materials-focused engineered solutions; highlights machining + diamond grinding and lined/coated products finished to precision tolerances.
process_tags: wear resistant coatings, linings, machining, grinding

Short Description: Specialty ball-valve manufacturer; PBM site highlights development/manufacture of specialty ball valves and multi-port valve innovation.

General Carbide Corporation is a vertically integrated manufacturer of tungsten carbide tooling and wear parts, headquartered in Greensburg, Westmoreland County, PA. Established in 1968, it is a certified woman-owned business (WBENC) that produces its own tungsten carbide grades from powder to finished product.

Holan, Inc. is a precision machining job shop based in Irwin, Westmoreland County, PA. They have been in operation for approximately 45 years, specializing in the manufacturing of machinery parts and tooling.
Designs/manufactures rotating equipment (centrifugal/axial compressors, steam turbines, power recovery expanders); product pages emphasize broad steam turbine line.
process_tags: Air and Gas Compressor Manufacturing, Turbine and Turbine Generator Set Units Manufacturing, Commercial and Industrial Machinery and Equipment (except

Short Description: Packaging company offering custom shipping boxes, displays and packs; positions itself around supply-chain transformation.
address: 567 Waltz Ml Rd, Ruffs Dale, PA 15679

Short Description: Roechling Industrial Mount Pleasant is a facility that specializes in manufacturing custom CNC-machined plastic components for various industrial applications. In October 2024, the facility completed a major expansion, nearly doubling its size.. Röchling Industrial offers thermoplastics/composites (semi-finished products through machined parts). A leader in custom CNC-machined plastic components (facility expansion noted).

O & S Machine Co., LLC is a precision machine shop located in Latrobe, Westmoreland County, PA. Founded in 1964 by John Orzehowski and Richard Stemmler, the company has operated for over 60 years. O & S Machine Co. provides expert machining and fabrication for both small-scale and large-scale production.

Basic Carbide Corporation is a global manufacturer of tungsten carbide preforms, tooling, and wear parts, headquartered in Lowber, Westmoreland County, PA. Founded in 1981, it is a family-owned and operated business. Basic Carbide specializes in custom-made tungsten carbide preforms in both cobalt and nickel grades.

Keystone Foam Corporation (now primarily operating as Keystone Foam) is a specialized foam fabricator located in Derry, Westmoreland County, PA. Founded in 1983, the company provides custom foam solutions for diverse industrial sectors. Custom foam fabrication serving medical, bedding, furniture, packaging; emphasizes durable/high-performance solutions.

McCullough Machine, Inc. is a precision manufacturing and industrial machinery company located in New Derry, Westmoreland County, PA. Founded in the early 1990s by Scot and Barbara McCullough, the company has grown from a home garage operation into a 27,000-square-foot production facility. The shop specializes in precision engineering, fabrication, and the production of industrial components for high-demand sectors.

S & S Tools, Inc. is an industrial supply and cutting tool distributor located in Latrobe, Westmoreland County, PA. They provide a range of tooling options and related services to manufacturing professionals. . Cutting tool + industrial supply distributor;  special HSS/carbide tooling and regrinding services.

Reliance Packaging & Supply Co is a "one-stop-shop". Specialties: Corrugated boxes, custom displays (counter and floor), and printed boxes. Supplies: They stock a wide range of shipping supplies like bubble wrap, tape, and mailers. Services: Offers fulfillment services and custom packaging design.
Keystone Foam Corporation specialize in protective packaging. Products: Custom foam inserts, cushioning, foam-for-kitting, and shipping pads.
FC Meyer Packaging Located in Jeannette specialize in Folding cartons, takeout boxes, and trays. Serves the food service industry (e.g., pizza boxes, bakery cartons) rather than industrial shipping.
